#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for (;t>0;t--){
        string a;
        cin >> a;
        string b;
        cin >> b;
        for (int c(0);c<a.size();c++){
            a=a+a[0];
            a.erase(a.begin());
            if (a==b){printf("YES\n");goto l;}

        }
        printf("NO\n");
     l:;
    }
    return 0;
}
